title: Seeds
description: is a mood and gratitude tracker that records and charts your good and bad days.
summary: This application is built with HTML, Tailwind CSS, Handlebars, Javascript, JQuery, Passport, Bcrypt, Express Sessions, and MySQL.

title: Buff
description: is a Movie Quiz game where it will ask the user on whether an actor has been in a movie or if a given movie has an actor.
summary: The application uses HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JQuery to render the pages and uses the Movie Database API to gather movies and actors/actresses.

title: Note Taker
description: is a note taking app that allows the user to create and save notes directly to the page.
summary: This application uses Express to save and retrieve note data from a JSON file. The user is able to create, save, view previous notes, and delete notes that will be saved to the page.

title: Workout Tracker
description: is an application that allows the user to track their workouts and view metrics for each workout.
summary: This application uses MongoDB and Express to allow the user to view and create daily workouts.

title: User Directory
description: is an application that allows the user to sort and search a table of users.
summary: This application uses React to render a table of random people from the Randomusers API. The user will then be able to search for a user or sort the names by alphabetical order.

title: Burger Time!
description: is a burger logger that will keep track of burgers of that have been eaten and are waiting to be eaten.
summary: This application uses MySQL, Node, express, Handlebars, and ORM to create the burger log.
